title: And This Is Why the Name 'Yahweh' is NOT In the Original Hebrew Text...

body: Because they were forbidden from speaking it out of respect
body_html: Because they were forbidden from speaking it out of respect

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: By the priestly class who wanted to obscure the true meaning of the third commandment, which condemned their actions: Don't use God's name for wrongdoing. They decided to reinterpret it as "don't pronounce it incorrectly" which is now wrongly reflected in most translations into any language.
body_html: By the priestly class who wanted to obscure the true meaning of the third commandment, which condemned their actions: Don't use God's name for wrongdoing. They decided to reinterpret it as "don't pronounce it incorrectly" which is now wrongly reflected in most translations into any language.

body: There's no evidence to suggest this, it's attested in every source we have and there's no reason for it to have been different. Even Jesus's given name means "YHWH saves".
body_html: There's no evidence to suggest this, it's attested in every source we have and there's no reason for it to have been different. Even Jesus's given name means "YHWH saves".

body: It's don't say it at all out of superstition there was a famous rabbi or something who said "I am not worthy to utter the name of God" and they all ran with it

body:
Matthew 10:16
KJV

“Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves. Be ye therefore wise as serpents and harmless as doves.
body_html:
Matthew 10:16 KJV

“Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves. Be ye therefore wise as serpents and harmless as doves.
